Aha! Another vid I've seen before it was featured! Well deserved Ronin Pawn ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
Where's Captain Kerbal? Or Spider Kerbal? Or Nick F. Kerbal?

> Where's Captain Kerbal? Or Spider Kerbal? Or Nick F. Kerbal?

I think Spider Kerman is on the ground staring blankly at the heli-carrier, planning his revenge on the Kavengers for not accepting him.

Much awesome

So Kerbal

Wow

Seriously, that was both awesome and hilarious. I love the first attempt at the Helipad landing: "Ok, this is going well, we're on a good course, coming down just right... Wait, throttle up! Throttle up! Oh no!" \*BOOM\*

That right there is how every great Kerbal adventure happens for me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

WHOA ... !!!

I'm really impressed, congrat's man !
